Rare Mobs Checklist: 
Eldinarcus 69.69,49.6* (Yahmage Rares 1)


-- Blood Elf Paladin Yougotta 00001-00005 Sunstrider Isle Part 1-5
-- ITEM Tainted Arcane Silver (20483) should be 100% drop rate off NPC Tainted Arcane Wraith (15298) for QUEST Tainted Arcane Sliver (8338) (ALREADY CORRECT) 

-- ITEM Lynx Collar (20797) should be 100% drop rate off NPCs Springpaw Cub (15366), Springpaw Lynx (15372) for QUEST Unfortunate Measures (8326) (DONE)

UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='100' WHERE  `Entry`=15366 AND `Item`=20797 AND `Reference`=0 AND `GroupId`=0;
UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='100' WHERE  `Entry`=15372 AND `Item`=20797 AND `Reference`=0 AND `GroupId`=0;

-- ITEM Arcane Silver (20482) "0.6777893639207508" over 959 repetitions rounded to 2/3rds (70% is also in likely margin of error, but 66.67% is closer to seen and given as second opinion so it will be the standard I go by) drop rate off NPCs Mana Wyrm (15274), Feral Tender (15294), Arcane Wraith (15273), Tainted Arcane Wraith (15298) for QUEST A Fistful of Silvers (8336) (DONE)

UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='66.67' WHERE  `Entry`=15274 AND `Item`=20482 AND `Reference`=0 AND `GroupId`=0;
UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='66.67' WHERE  `Entry`=15294 AND `Item`=20482 AND `Reference`=0 AND `GroupId`=0;
UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='66.67' WHERE  `Entry`=15273 AND `Item`=20482 AND `Reference`=0 AND `GroupId`=0;
UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='66.67' WHERE  `Entry`=15298 AND `Item`=20482 AND `Reference`=0 AND `GroupId`=0;

-- Blood Elf Paladin Yougotta 00007-00012 Eversong Woods North Sanctum West Sanctum Tranquil Shore Golden Strand northern The Dead Scar
-- ITEM Incriminating Documents (20765) correctly 100% on NPC Darnassian Scout (15968) (ALREADY DONE)

-- There are twice as many NPC Grimscale Forager (15670) as NPC Grimscale Seer (15950) and twice as many NPC Grimscale Murloc (15668) as NPC Grimscale Oracle (15669) (DONE)
UPDATE `creature` SET `id1`=15670, `id2`=15670, `id3`=15950 WHERE `id1` IN (15670, 15950);
UPDATE `creature` SET `id1`=15668, `id2`=15668, `id3`=15669 WHERE `id1` IN (15668, 15669);

-- Two Gameobjects Tattered Chest at a time one on each side of the Shore/Strand, but there is a third long spawn that is rarely up (Gameobject Tattered Chest NEED RESEARCHED MORE)

-- Drop rate improvements over 1144 itterations:
-- ITEM Captain Kelisendra's Lost Rutters (21776) = Already Correct 10%
-- Other quest ITEMs Grimscale Murloc Head (21757), Captain Kelisendra's Cargo (21771) appear to be about 45% rate (it is possible the casters are higher rate, but unproven within margin of error)
UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='45' WHERE  `Item`=21757;
UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='45' WHERE  `Item`=21771;

-- The murlocs will occasionally (rarely) do a group fear event, and also when on Mmmrrrggglll's quest on his death will do a very large one

-- Blood Elf Paladin Yougotta 00012 Sunsail Anchorage Goldennough Pass, feat Springpaw Pelt
-- Springpaw Stalkers may share spawns with at least  Feral Dragonhawk Hatchlings but only occasionally, same with Crazed Dragonhawks and Elder Springpaws

-- 15 OBJECT Weapon Containers (181107) can be up at a time, on a short (2 mins?) timer

-- Blood Elf Paladin Yougotta 00016-00021 East Sanctum, feat Springpaw Pelt  00017 feat Whitebark's Spirit functionality and Powering our Defenses functionality
-- 11 Tainted Soil can be up at once in area around East Sanctum 

-- Springpaw Stalker 213/445  Elder Springpaw 112/238 drop rate of Springpaw Pelt (~47.5% 325/683)
UPDATE `creature_loot_template` SET `Chance`='45' WHERE  `Item`=20772;

-- Blood Elf Paladin Yougotta 00022 Eversong Woods Duskwither Spire Tor'Watha Quests
-- Nothing spectacular about those quests
